shri lanka idam godakirime ha sanwardhanaya kirime sansthawa sathu mudal sambandhayen saparadhi wishwasaya kadakirimata kumanthranaya kirima, ee anuwa ema sansthawa sathu rupiyal miliyana 49kata aasanna mudalak (ru.48,563,929.06)sambandhayen saparadhi wishwasaya kadakirima, ee sandaha aadhara anubala dima athulu chodana 49k yatathe nithipathiwaraya wisin withthikaruwanta erehiwa nadu pawara atha.

shrilanipaye jyeshta nayakayaku wana nimal siripala da silwa mahatha agamathi karamin eksath janatha nidahas sandhana aanduwak pihituwima sadaha parlimenthuwe bahuthara balaya penwimata athsan karamin athi diwurum prakasha sadaha shri lanka nidahas pakshaye amathiwarun kihipa denekuma athsan thaba nothibima nisa ema wadapiliwela atharamaga anahita thibe.
lasantha: puwathpath kathuwarun wisin sakas kota thibena me aachara dharma paddhathiya kriyathmaka kirima pawari thibenne shri lanka puwathpath paminili komisamata.
ee nisa adala puwathpathe kathuwaraya genwa awawada karana lesa kathanayakawarayagen illa sitinawa”.kathanayakawarayameka barapathala prashnayak.
